alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 11 at 2:38AM MST until May 11 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT TODAY FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM MST /11 AM TO 8 PM MDT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 45 to 55 mph expected. A few gusts near 60 mph possible, especially downwind of the San Francisco Peaks, Kaibab Plateau and Black Mesa late this afternoon. * WHERE...Most of northern Arizona, including Yavapai County, the Mogollon Rim and the White Mountains northward to the Utah border. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening /11 AM TO 8 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust and sand with reduced visibility are likely across northeastern Arizona.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
